description: Selected excerpts from The Book of Wisdom (Kitab Al-Hikam) by Ibn Ata-Allah al-Iskandari. The text is over 700 years old and is still one of the most relevant spiritual texts today.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, open The Book of Wisdom
Alexa, ask The Book of Wisdom to drop some knowledge on me
Alexa, ask The Book of Wisdom to enlighten me
name: Book of Wisdom
shortDescription: Get advice from the Book of Wisdom
